mainSequence.step: Admin requests to add a new other service.
UI receives the request and displays the form to add service.
Admin submits the new service data.
UI sends the service details to the Router.
Router directs the service data to the Controller.
Controller adds the new service to the Repository.
Repository saves the new service in the database.
OtherServiceModel creates a new service from the data.
OtherServiceModel inserts the new service into the database.
Repository confirms that the new service was added successfully.
Controller sends the success response to the Router.
Router sends a success response to the UI.
UI displays a success message to the Admin.
